definition: not agreeing with your tastes or expectations
details:
adjective
- not agreeing with your tastes or expectations
= synonyms: disagreeable
- lacking in sympathy and kindness
= synonyms: unkindly
- not having an open mind
= synonyms: closed
- not sympathetic or disposed toward
= example: not sympathetic or disposed toward
- (of characters in literature or drama) tending to evoke antipathetic feelings
= example: (of characters in literature or drama) tending to evoke antipathetic feelings
= synonyms: unappealing
